trans-unit.target: Retomando pausada dispara o relógio do storyboard a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to a new position when the next clock tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: Busca este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para uma nova posição quando ocorrer o próximo tique do relógio.

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that describes the amount by which the timeline should move forward or backward.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo ou negativo que descreve a distância que a linha de tempo deve avançar ou retroceder.

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Busca este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para a posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> performs the requested seek when the next clock tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> executa a busca selecionada quando o próximo tique do relógio ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as operações de busca não executam o storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> configurações em conta.

trans-unit.source: The storyboard is treated as though it has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O storyboard é tratado como se tivesse um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> de 1 e não <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um storyboard controlável no código, você deve usar a sobrecarga apropriada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controlável.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to seek (skip) to one second after a Storyboard begins.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como buscar um segundo após o início de um Storyboard (ignorar).

trans-unit.source: The next example shows both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to a new position immediately (synchronously).
trans-unit.target: Busca este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para uma nova posição imediatamente (de forma síncrona).

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that describes the amount by which the timeline should move forward or backward.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo ou negativo que descreve a distância que a linha de tempo deve avançar ou retroceder.

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to a new position immediately (synchronously).
trans-unit.target: Busca este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para uma nova posição imediatamente (de forma síncrona).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> aligns the seeked time of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> Alinha a hora buscado do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> com a última escala de relógio.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, even though the screen does not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: Valores são imediatamente atualizados para refletir as alterações devido à <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, mesmo que a tela não reflete as alterações até que as atualizações de tela.

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as operações de busca não executam o storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> configurações em conta.

trans-unit.source: The storyboard is treated as though it has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O storyboard é tratado como se tivesse um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> de 1 e não <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um storyboard controlável no código, você deve usar a sobrecarga apropriada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controlável.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that describes the amount by which the timeline should move forward or backward from the specified <c>origin</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo ou negativo que descreve a distância que a linha de tempo deve avançar ou retroceder da <c>origem</c> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The position from which <c>offset</c> is applied.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o <c>deslocamento</c> é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to a new position immediately (synchronously).
trans-unit.target: Busca este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para uma nova posição imediatamente (de forma síncrona).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> aligns the seeked time of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> Alinha a hora buscado do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> com a última escala de relógio.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, even though the screen does not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: Valores são imediatamente atualizados para refletir as alterações devido à <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>, mesmo que a tela não reflete as alterações até que as atualizações de tela.

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as operações de busca não executam o storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> configurações em conta.

trans-unit.source: The storyboard is treated as though it has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O storyboard é tratado como se tivesse um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> de 1 e não <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the interactive speed ratio for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Define a taxa de velocidade interativa para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foi criado para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than zero that is the new interactive speed ratio of the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Um valor finito maior que zero é a nova razão de velocidade interativa do storyboard.

trans-unit.source: This value is multiplied against the storyboard's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> value to determine the storyboard's effective speed.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é multiplicado pelo valor <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> do storyboard para determinar a velocidade efetiva do storyboard.

trans-unit.source: This value does not overwrite the storyboard's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor não substituirá a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> do storyboard.

trans-unit.source: For example, calling this method and specifying an interactive speed ratio of 3 on a storyboard with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> of 0.5 gives the storyboard an effective speed of 1.5.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, chamar este método e especificar uma razão de velocidade interativa de 3 em um storyboard com um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio" /> de 0,5 proporciona ao storyboard uma velocidade efetiva de 1,5.

trans-unit.source: Sets the interactive speed ratio for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.target: Para tornar um storyboard controlável no código, você deve usar a sobrecarga apropriada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controlável.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: Calling this method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is not guaranteed that this object can be correctly referenced from XAML.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of this storyboard's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Adianta a hora atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> deste storyboard até o final do período ativo.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of this storyboard's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Adianta a hora atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> deste storyboard até o final do período ativo.

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: Um storyboard controlável pode pausar, retomar, procurar, parar e ser removida.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um storyboard controlável no código, você deve usar a sobrecarga apropriada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controlável.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: O objeto especificado quando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foram criados para esse storyboard e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of this storyboard's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Adianta a hora atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> deste storyboard até o final do período ativo.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the storyboard's current time to the end of its active period; the storyboard's behavior at this point is specified by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Esse método avança o storyboard atual tempo até o final do seu período ativo; comportamento do storyboard neste ponto é especificado pelo seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> configuração.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.HoldEnd>, the storyboard fills; if the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.Stop>, the storyboard stops.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.HoldEnd>, preenche o storyboard; se a propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior.Stop>, o storyboard parar.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on a storyboard with an infinite duration, an infinite number of repetitions has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método em um storyboard com uma duração infinita, um número infinito de repetições não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an inactive storyboard has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método em um storyboard inativo não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Advancing a clock to its fill period triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Aprimorando um relógio a seu preenchimento gatilhos períodos o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar este storyboard interativamente, você deve usar o mesmo `containingObject` parâmetro ao chamar os métodos interativos que você usou para iniciar o storyboard.

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: Um storyboard controlável pode pausar, retomar, procurar, parar e ser removida.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: Stops the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foi criado para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foi criado para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Note that stopping a storyboard does not fire the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Observe que interromper um storyboard não dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> evento.

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: O objeto especificado quando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foram criados para esse storyboard e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> que foi criado para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped> storyboard no longer affects its target properties: properties that were animated revert to their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped> storyboard não afeta mais suas propriedades de destino: propriedades que foram animadas reverter para os valores anteriores.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Parando gatilhos um relógio de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos, mas não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> evento.
